website_summaries.verdict: A good source of vitamin E that won't break the bank.
pros: Each easy-to-swallow capsule has 400 IU of vitamin E. Contains 1333% RDA of vitamin E. Great for hair loss
cons: Contains a synthetic form of vitamin E rather than a natural form

customer_reviews.title: I Took These A Few Months Before Surgery
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I started taking these because I was told it would help with recovery when having surgery. I honestly did much better while taking these 6 months before my second surgery. They really worked for me. I take vitamin A too and I still take one a day just to stay healthy. All in all, I have come to trust Nature Made because I see and feel the results from their vitamins. I will buy more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. ProvinceTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Synthetic version of Vitamin E. I should’ve read more carefully when looking at the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Geanette Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Mistake
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the one I normally purchase I always get the plant based product that Nature Made has I simply didn’t read carefully enough thought I was actually saving money on Amazon should really know better than that!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricco

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described and the expiration date is pretty far too - so that is good!
customer_reviews.author: N. DESAI

customer_reviews.title: high quality  products from a trusted supplier
customer_reviews.text: Instructed to take this by my M.D. Long experience with Nature Made (other supplements) has never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Britt

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with the product. I take it and I put it on my face as well as a moisturizer under the foundation
customer_reviews.author: eva gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: We are so glad to get the water soluble
customer_reviews.text: We are so glad to get the water soluble. It came faster than the delivery date said and all in good order. Thank you Teddy Rose
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Rose

customer_reviews.title: Nature Made Vitamin E
customer_reviews.text: We've been taking Nature Made Vitamin E over forty years now. I had fibroid tumors in my breast for years. My OBGYN told me to take 400ICU daily you'll have no more fibroid tumors ever. It did the TRICK haven't had ANY in forty years. My husband started taking 1 Nature Made Vitamin to protect his prostrate. He's had great reports from his doctor too. I read about Nature Made Vitamins how GREAT they are for your HEALTH BENEFITS.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret W.

customer_reviews.title: Better way to shop
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to order, you get it in a timely manner. there is no flavor to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with vitamin E
customer_reviews.text: Like with any vitamin or supplement, it will work well if you take it consistently. I am very happy with the quality from Nature Made.
customer_reviews.author: Zero

customer_reviews.title: I appreciate that I could order the vitamins my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate that I could order the vitamins my husband and I use, rather than having to walk through a drug store or mega store on a foot that recently went through surgery. And I saved money!
customer_reviews.author: Connie B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is not the "good Vitamin E." You want the natural D-alpha Tocopherol, not this Dl-alpha Tocopherol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
